entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: Periods of heavy rain, and amounts may approach warning criteria or possibly exceed them in localised areas. Thunderstorms possible from Thursday evening. Note, a more significant heavy rain event is expected on Saturday and early Sunday. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Severe Thunderstorm Watch
entry.summary:
Afternoon and early evening thunderstorms are expected about eastern parts of Bay of Plenty and northern Gisborne/Tairawhiti. Some of these thunderstorms may become SEVERE east of Opotiki, producing downpours of 25 to 40 mm per hour.
Rainfall of this intensity can cause surface and/or flash flooding, especially about low-lying areas such as streams, rivers or narrow valleys, and may also lead to slips.
Driving conditions will also be hazardous with surface flooding and poor visibility in heavy rain.
